metadata.full_description:
Below is a structured, detailed extraction of everything visible and relevant in the provided screenshot.

1) Visual description (what the image shows)
- A smartphone screenshot of an event listing page (from luma.com). The top and bottom of the phone UI (status bar, navigation area) are visible.
- The main image in the listing is a wide-angle photo of an indoor auditorium/theater:
  - Red walls, red upholstered tiered seating, black ceiling with angled red light-trimmed features, overhead stage rigging and spotlights.
  - A stage foreground (black stage surface) with at least one white pot containing a green plant and a few small plants on the stage edge.
  - Center aisle and stair rows visible; stage faces empty audience seating.
- Page chrome and UI elements from the luma event page surround the photograph (title, host, date, location, buttons).
- Overall color theme in photo: deep red seats/walls, black stage/ceiling.

2) All text visible in the image (verbatim where legible)
- Top/status bar: "6:52" (time). On the right: "16.0 KB/s" and battery icon with "37%".
- Browser/address header: "i show my friend how to b..." and under it "luma.com"
- Top-left page/logo: "luma" (logo)
- Top-right header actions: "Explore Events" and "Sign In"
- Badge/tag over photo: "Featured in Dubai"
- Event title: "i show my friend how to build his first ai app -- live on stage in dubai."
- Host line: "Hosted by farza & Siddharth Haldar"
- Date block icon: "DEC 28"
- Date/time lines: "Sunday, December 28" and "12:30 PM - 2:30 PM"
- Location lines: "GEMS Modern Academy" and "Dubai, Dubai"
- Bottom status/pill: "Starting in 4d 17h"
- (Small/ui text/icons visible but not fully legible: a share icon, overflow/menu icon)

3) People, places, or objects identified
- People (textual hosts listed): "farza" and "Siddharth Haldar" (hosts named in the listing). No people are visible in the auditorium photo.
- Place(s):
  - Dubai (city)
  - GEMS Modern Academy (venue)
- Objects visible in the photo:
  - Theater/auditorium seating (red seats)
  - Stage (black)
  - Potted plants (white pot visible on stage)
  - Stage lighting rig/overhead lights
  - Stairs/aisles and handrails
  - Microphone or small stage equipment may be present at stage edge (not clearly legible)

4) Business/company names
- luma (luma.com) — the hosting site for the event listing
- GEMS Modern Academy — the venue listed for the event

5) Contact information
- No explicit contact phone numbers, email addresses, websites or postal addresses are visible in the screenshot. The only URL text shown is "luma.com" in the browser header. The venue is listed as "GEMS Modern Academy" with location "Dubai, Dubai" but no address or contact details are shown.

6) Any other relevant details
- Event specifics:
  - Title: "i show my friend how to build his first ai app -- live on stage in dubai."
  - Hosted by: farza & Siddharth Haldar
  - Date & time: Sunday, December 28, 12:30 PM - 2:30 PM
  - Venue: GEMS Modern Academy, Dubai
  - Listing shows "Featured in Dubai"
  - Countdown indicator: "Starting in 4d 17h" (relative time to event)
- Platform/UI:
  - The page is an event listing on luma.com (desktop/mobile web or app view).
  - Top of page includes "Explore Events" and "Sign In" options.
- No visible tickets, pricing, registration link, or contact details on this screenshot.
- The screenshot appears to be taken on an Android phone (status icons, battery percent placement, and UI style suggest Android).

If you want, I can:
- Extract the event URL if you provide the page link or a larger screenshot showing the browser address bar.
- Help search for GEMS Modern Academy contact details or the luma event page for registration and more info.

metadata.full_description:
1) Visual description
- Screenshot of a mobile web page (luma.com) showing an event listing. The top of the phone screen shows status icons (time, data speed, battery).
- Main image: an indoor theatre/auditorium with red walls, red tiered seating, central aisle and stepped rows, a raised stage in the foreground with small potted plants on it, stage monitors/speakers, overhead stage lighting rigs and recessed ceiling lights. The auditorium is empty (no audience visible).
- Below the photo is the event information panel and UI elements (badges, host avatars, date/time, location, action buttons/icons).

2) All visible text (verbatim where readable)
- Top status bar: "6:52" (time), "16.0 KB/s", "37%" (battery)
- Browser/app bar: "i show my friend how to b..." (truncated title), "luma.com"
- Top-left logo: "luma" (with star)
- Top-right buttons: "Explore Events ↗", "Sign In"
- Badge: "Featured in Dubai"
- Event title: "i show my friend how to build his first ai app -- live on stage in dubai."
- Hosts line: "Hosted by farza & Siddharth Haldar"
- Date badge: "DEC 28"
- Date/time: "Sunday, December 28", "12:30 PM - 2:30 PM"
- Location: "GEMS Modern Academy", "Dubai, Dubai"
- Bottom overlay: "Starting in 4d 17h"

3) People, places, or objects identified
- People: no identifiable people in the photograph of the auditorium. The event is hosted by two named individuals (from text): "farza" and "Siddharth Haldar" — these are names shown in the listing (small circular host avatars are visible in the UI).
- Places: GEMS Modern Academy (location), Dubai (city).
- Objects and scene items visible in the photo: stage, potted plants on stage, stage monitors/speakers, red tiered theatre seats, aisle and stairs, handrails, overhead lighting rig, recessed ceiling lights, auditorium walls and carpeted floor.

4) Business/company names
- luma (site / brand shown at top; URL luma.com)
- GEMS Modern Academy (venue)
- Dubai (featured location / city)

5) Contact information shown
- Website: "luma.com" (visible in the UI)
- No phone numbers, no email addresses, and no street address are visible in the image. Only the venue name and city are shown ("GEMS Modern Academy", "Dubai, Dubai").

6) Any other relevant details
- The event title is written in all lowercase and contains a double hyphen: "--".
- Event duration: 2 hours (12:30 PM to 2:30 PM) on Sunday, December 28 (DEC 28).
- The page is marked "Featured in Dubai".
- A small status indicator shows the event will be starting in "4d 17h" relative to when the screenshot was taken.
- UI controls visible: back/close icon (X), a downward caret, share icon, three-dot menu — indicating this is a mobile browser/app view.
- The auditorium image suggests a medium-to-large capacity theater with tiered seating and professional stage lighting (useful if someone needs a visual sense of the venue).
- No explicit ticketing price, RSVP link, or contact phone/email is visible in the screenshot; further details likely on the luma.com event page.

If you want, I can:
- Extract the page URL more precisely (if you provide the full browser address bar), or
- Search for the Luma event online to pull full event details (ticket link, organizer contact, exact address).

metadata.full_description:
Below is a detailed, structured analysis of the provided screenshot.

1) Visual description (what the image shows)
- A portrait-oriented smartphone screenshot of an events page (web/app) that displays a photograph of a large indoor auditorium/theater. The auditorium has tiered seating with red seats and red walls/ceiling accents. There are stepped aisles and overhead stage lighting rigs visible. The photograph appears to be taken from the stage looking out into the audience area; part of the stage surface (black) is visible in the foreground, with small potted plants placed on the stage edge.
- The screenshot includes the site/app UI: header with site name/logo, page title, event details (date/time/location), host info, and a small countdown/notification overlay near the bottom.
- Device status bar is visible at top (time, notification icons, data rate, battery %), and the Android gesture navigation pill is visible at the bottom.

2) Any text visible in the image (OCR-style, as exactly as visible where possible)
- Top browser/address area:
  - "i show my friend how to b..." (truncated)
  - "luma.com"
- Top-left of page: "luma" (logo)
- Top-right: "Explore Events" (with arrow) and "Sign In"
- Badge/tag overlaid on photo: "Featured in Dubai"
- Main event title (large): "i show my friend how to build his first ai app -- live on stage in dubai."
- Host line: "Hosted by farza & Siddharth Haldar"
- Date/time block:
  - Small date badge: "DEC 28"
  - "Sunday, December 28"
  - "12:30 PM - 2:30 PM"
- Location:
  - "GEMS Modern Academy" (with a location icon)
  - "Dubai, Dubai"
- Bottom overlay (countdown): "Starting in 4d 17h"
- Misc UI: share icon (top right of image), three-dot menu icon (top right), back (X) icon (top left)
- Device status bar text/icons: "6:52", Gmail icon, "16.0 KB/s", battery icon, "37%"

3) People, places, or objects identified
- People:
  - No persons are clearly visible in the auditorium photograph (seats are empty). The page lists hosts by name (text): "farza" and "Siddharth Haldar" (these are event hosts, not photographed/identified in the image).
- Places:
  - Dubai (city referenced multiple times)
  - GEMS Modern Academy (event venue)
- Objects/scene elements visible in the photograph:
  - Stage (black stage floor)
  - Tiered red auditorium seating
  - Aisle stairs between seating blocks
  - Overhead stage lighting trusses/rigging
  - Ceiling panels with inset lighting
  - Potted plants on stage (white pot visible)
  - Microphone or speaker equipment may be present near stage edge (small black objects)
  - Carpeted flooring in seating area

4) Business/company names
- luma (site name/logo shown at top; URL luma.com)
- GEMS Modern Academy (venue)
- The event listing also shows "Featured in Dubai" (not a company but a category tag)

5) Contact information (phone, email, website, address)
- Website visible: "luma.com" (in the address/title area)
- No phone numbers, email addresses, or postal/street address are visible in the screenshot.
- Location text: "GEMS Modern Academy, Dubai, Dubai" (venue and city shown, but no street address)

6) Any other relevant details
- The event title uses all-lowercase text and includes "ai" and "dubai".
- Event timing: Sunday, December 28, 12:30 PM - 2:30 PM (presumably local Dubai time; timezone not shown).
- The page shows two small circular avatar thumbnails next to the host line (indicating host profile pictures), but the people in those thumbnails are not identified further in the screenshot.
- UI elements indicate an event platform (Explore Events, Sign In), share and menu options—this is an event listing page rather than a pure photo.
- The screenshot was taken on an Android device (status bar style, gesture pill), time on device 6:52, and battery 37%. Data transfer indicator shows "16.0 KB/s".
- A countdown/notification overlay reads "Starting in 4d 17h" indicating how far away the event is from the screenshot time.
- The photograph of the auditorium suggests a medium-to-large event space appropriate for presentations or performances.
- No phone/email contact details or ticket links are visible in the screenshot; additional event/contact info may be available on the luma.com event page beyond the cropped area.

If you want, I can:
- Extract the full readable text as a plain text block.
- Search for the event page online to pull full event details (tickets, contact info, full address) if you give permission to look it up.
